name: Odd-Eyes Solblaze Dragon
description:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 face-up Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck, but you cannot Special Summon while you control that face-up monster, except Pendulum Monsters. If this card is in your GY: You can banish 2 other Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, and/or Pendulum Monsters from your GY; Special Summon this card. You can only use 1 "Odd-Eyes Solblaze Dragon" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
